title: Marios Chlympatsos
paragraphs: I am a recent graduate from ACS Athens, where I completed my high school education with honors, consistently achieving top grades in several semesters. My academic journey at ACS Athens was marked by a deep engagement with subjects like business, economics, and statistics, which have fueled my passion for understanding the intricacies of the global market.

This fall, I am thrilled to begin my studies at The Hague University of Applied Sciences, where I will be pursuing a degree in International Business. My academic experiences have provided me with a solid foundation in business principles, and I have actively sought out opportunities to apply this knowledge in real-world settings. I am highly ambitious and driven, with a clear vision for my future career in the international business arena.
